ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow) 1520 mg/l/96 hr (confidence limit 1450 - 1580 mg/l), flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 24.4 °C, dissolved oxygen 7.3 mg/l, hardness 47.0 mg/l calcium carbonate, alkalinity 40.1 mg/l calcium carbonate, and pH 7.6.

EC50 Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow) 1520 mg/l/96 hr (confidence limit 1450 - 1580 mg/l), flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 24.4 °C, dissolved oxygen 7.3 mg/l, hardness 47.0 mg/l calcium carbonate, alkalinity 40.1 mg/l calcium carbonate, and pH 7.6. Effect: loss of equilibrium.
